span.p: The School District of Hatboro-Horsham welcomes you to the website of one of the finest school districts in Pennsylvania, where we view everyone as a "Champion of Learning." Our suburban Philadelphia school district of approximately 5000 students is a forward-thinking, progressive educational organization with a rich history of academic excellence that we will strive to exceed as we move into the future.

p.span: ALL HATBORO-HORSHAM SCHOOL DISTRICT BUILDINGS AND FACILITIES ARE CLOSED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

Pennsylvania Governor Wolf has directed schools to close indefinitely as a measure to help prevent the spread of the COVID-19 Coronavirus. Montgomery county residents have been directed to stay at home. Please help to keep our community safe by remembering that under the current directive issued by the governor to stay-at-home ALL HHSD facilities, including district buildings, athletic fields, stadiums, playgrounds and properties are closed indefinitely.
Please continue to follow social distancing and respiratory hygiene practices to keep yourselves and our community safe.
We will continue to provide regular updates to our community during this time. For more resources, please visit our COVID-19 page for the latest district updates.

span.span: The District is pleased to announce the finalist for the position of Superintendent. Please visit our New Superintendent page for the details.

span.p: Please note parents and students get to canvas in different ways. The students can find their link here https://www.hatboro-horsham.org/domain/313 and use their email address and network password to get in.

span.p: Parents can find their link here https://www.hatboro-horsham.org/domain/20 and use their email address and login. If you forgot your parent user name or password please email appsvcs@hatboro-horsham.org.

a.title: Go to comments for Accessing Your Canvas Account

span.p: Help us in our search for a new superintendent.

p.a: Click here to take the community survey or to apply for the position

a.title: Go to comments for Hatters Your Opinion Matters

span.p: Parent/guardian contact information can be updated by logging into your parent/guardian powerschool portal.
If you do not have an account please email appsvcs@hatboro-horsham.org
or contact your child's building secretary.
If you have updated your information but feel you are not getting our messages please contact appsvcs@hatboro-horsham.org Sometimes the carriers will flag our messages as spam.

padding: 19% 0;

padding-top: 8px;
color:#3897f0; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:550; line-height:18px;

margin-left: auto;
width: 0px; border-top: 8px solid #F4F4F4; border-right: 8px solid transparent; transform: translateY(16px);
background-color: #F4F4F4; flex-grow: 0; height: 12px; width: 16px; transform: translateY(-4px);
width: 0; height: 0; border-top: 8px solid #F4F4F4; border-left: 8px solid transparent; transform: translateY(-4px) translateX(8px);
